title: Lets talk about Zoe
body:
Which one of you fuckin retards at Riot thought it was a good idea to have a 2 sec stun on a level one spell with such a low cd

fix that shit idiots

replies.body:
Zoe's sleep should only boost damage from Zoe. Not next damage taken (from any champ).

I'm just sayin'

Her e is the only unbalanced thing in her kit though, her q actually takes skill to set up and land properly so it deals high dmg. They just need to increase the cd on her e so she can only use it once in a fight.

Sion's Stun _(knockup, same thing)_ can be 2.25 seconds at level 1, and unlike Zoe's it doesn't end the duration once you take damage. Its cooldown is also shorter _(even with Zoe's refund)_.

Also.. yea... Zoe is totally the problem with this game.....

Personally I don't think theres anything wrong with the sleep duration itself, I think the problem is that she can set up and pump out her whole combo between the time that it **lands**, and it ending. She should have to start setting up her combo during the travel time if she wants to take full advantage of it. So perhaps either the falling asleep process needs to be shorter to give her less time to react, or the time it takes to set up an accurate paddlestar should be longer.

But I don't think this _(her biggest balance problem)_  even comes close to the smallest problems of some of our long time resident champions.
